name: Random choice
description: Characteristics of our application  - Generate random numbers in a certain range, with the option of creating a list of results as well. - Generate random words from a list predefined by you, you can also create lists with words in random order. - Combine the words on your list in random order, this is useful if you want to get a list of secret friends or match opponents in a game. - Combine lists of words from different topics in a sort of random paired terms. - Choose whether the results are repeated or not, depending on what you need in all the sections. - Save your random data lists for a later consultation.
